thread.section_title: Pigeon Mountain Trading Company Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Pigeon Mountain Trading Company | pigeonmountaintrading.com
thread.title: Elaine
thread.title_full: Pigeon Mountain Trading Company reviewed by Elaine

author: Elaine
title: Elaine
text: I am ready to start my hive this year, and could not find bees within driving distance of my home. Many bee suppliers are 'pick-up only' and that was creating a problem for me. When I found Pigeon Mountain Trading Company online, I was relieved to see that they are accustomed to packaging bees for shipping via USPS. And they gave me an arrival date so that I can prepare my mail carrier and be home on that day. I thought the cost reasonable, given that they were willing to ship. I only gave a 4 star rating as I have not yet received my bees. But I am very pleased with the online ordering process. Good job!
